TextView.android:text: Paneer Burger is a unique and delicious burger recipe which is an Indian fusion recipe. You can say it is one of the Indian street food version that includes paneer.

Ingredients-\n\nPaneer 500 gm. All-Purpose Flour 80-100 gm. Red Chili Powder 1 tsp. Green Chili Paste 1 tbsp. Black Pepper 1 tsp. Salt As Per Taste. Lemon Juice 2-3 tbsp. Water As Required. Bread Crumbs 30-40 gm. Butter 2-3 tbsp. Bun 3 pcs. Tomato Sauce 3-4 tbsp. Mayonnaise 1 tbsp. Peri-Peri Masala 1 tbsp. Cabbage 2-3 leaves

Procedure-\n\nStep 1 - Cut the paneer into large pieces. Step 2 - Take a bowl. Add all-purpose flour, red chili powder, green chili paste, black pepper, salt, lemon juice, and water. Mix everything. Add water gradually if needed more to get the thickness required. Step 3 - Coat the paneer pieces into the mixture. Then coat it with the bread crumbs properly. Heat oil in a pan. Deep-fry the paneer until it turns golden brown, and the outer layer turns slightly crisp. Step 4 - Take another pan and melt butter into it. Roast the slices of burger buns into it from both sides for a minute. Step 5 - In a bowl, add ketchup, mayonnaise, and peri-peri masala. Mix it properly. Step 6 - Take the slices and spread the sauce on them. Place the cabbage, paneer and cover the other slice on it. Paneer Burger is ready. Enjoy it with fries and chilled drinks.
